lexUnit.name: ingredient.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: something that enters into a compound or becomes part of a combination or mixture.

sentence.text: The main chemical ingredients for life are derived from combinations of carbon , hydrogen , oxygen and nitrogen , which we can abbreviate to CHON .
